ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Neolithic Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make basic neolithic cooking benches with faster work speed compared to spots.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Neolithic Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced neolithic cooking buildings to enhance efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Medieval Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make medieval cooking benches with faster work speed compared to their neolithic predecessors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Medieval Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced medieval cooking buildings to enhance efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Industrial Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make industrial cooking benches with faster work speed compared to their medieval predecessors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Industrial Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced industrial cooking buildings to enhance efficiency.
